title: League of Legends won't work!
body:
So just 10-20mins ago I started a ranked match, everything went smoothly until the part where it loads the game. Everytime I try reloading it - it keeps crashing on me (Bugsplat). I have restarted my client multiple times and my computer and nothing is working. I have also been on another account to test if I can go in to a game (Custom) and still nothing. There is nothing wrong with my internet also. It just keeps crashing! I lost my placement because of this.
Is this happening to anyone else?
Please help!

replies.body: What OS are you on and what are your computer specs? Do you know how to run a DirectX diagnosis?
